name: ΩΩΩOrz
description:
perform the title. A cute 2d synthesizer

Drag obstacles and animals on to the tracks to play different sound patterns. Click play to start. 

Made in Ludum Dare 47 Jam

Designed by Suyi Diao, Shirley Huang, Rachel Li, and Siyi Chen

Level Design: Suyi Diao

Character Art and Animation: Shirley Huang

Environment Art: Rachel Li

Music: Siyi Chen
